name: Pants Are Ray
description:
Ray, do you want to save the world?

This is the shortest, most recursiviest and essentially condensed RPG ever.

Controls
Movement via arrow keys, dialogue advancement via Enter key.

Save the world, or don't.
Frankly, we don't care

Sincerely,
Florian Jindra
David Fasching (Itch.io user avi90)
Wolfgang Schütz
